result.execSummary:
The defendant Linda Marie Hurckman was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Linda Marie Hurckman is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Linda Marie Hurckman was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Use of a Dangerous Weapon, Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).
  • Linda Marie Hurckman was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Use of a Dangerous Weapon, Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).
  • Linda Marie Hurckman was found guilty of Possession of THC (2nd+ Offense) [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).
  • Linda Marie Hurckman was found guilty of Child Abuse-Recklessly Cause Harm, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.03(3)(b).
  • Linda Marie Hurckman was found guilty of Operate with Restricted Controlled Substance (1st w/Pass.), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(am).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Linda Marie Hurckman
Current: W1595 Rupnow Road, Fall River, WI 53932 United States  (Effective: 12-29-2014)
Prior: W6623 Old River Road, Portage, WI 53901 United States

Defendant Linda Marie Hurckman in court with attorney Karl A Green.  Troy D Cross appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court went over the rights & elements. Defendant plead no contest to counts 1,2,5, 8, & 9. Court found defendant guilty, entered judgment, sentence withheld on cts. 1&2 - 2 yr. probation, conds: $543 costs on each count, Complete AODA and comply with all treatment recommendations. Domestic abuse counseling, any other counseling as recommended by agent. Periodic review in six months on probation counts. All costs to be paid first 2 yrs. of probation.  Absolute sobriety, no possession of any drugs, legal or illegal, without prescription. On Cts. 5&8, sentence withheld, 4 yr. probation, concurrent, $518 costs on each count, same conds. as in cts. 1&2. On ct. 9, 6 mos. jail starting Feb. 16, 2015 at 7 p.m. Good time granted.  Huber granted pursuant to WI. Stat. 303.08, $1,379 fine, 60 days to pay fine or set up a payment plan with Clerk of Courts.12 month drivers license revocation, 12 month IID. Complete AODA and comply with all treatment recommendations. Court granted 2 days jail credit. Cts. 3,4,6,&7 dismissed.
Plea/sentencing hearing on December 29, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
